description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Horizontal Shoot-em-up. The world is on the brink of destruction and no one has anything left to lose. The nation of Pangea has gained the upper hand and is about to grasp victory. With only 10 missions left, their newest mercenary, Italina, has been given the Tobias, an experimental jet with a flamethrower. Will Italina bring victory to Pangea, or will the war take her life as well?
description.short: Horizontal Shoot-em-up. The world is on the brink of destruction and no one has anything left to lose. The nation of Pangea has gained the upper hand and is about to grasp victory. With only 10 missions left, their newest mercenary, Italina, has been given the Tobias, an experimental jet with a flamethrower. Will Italina bring victory to Pangea, or will the war take her life as well?
